hero.name: James Marriott
hero.heading: Full-Stack Developer
hero.subheading: Creating scalable web applications with React, TypeScript, and Node.js

aboutMe.heading: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am a British full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience in building enterprise-level web applications. Based in Kristiansand, Norway, I specialize in React, TypeScript, and Node.js ecosystems with particular expertise in Next.js and GraphQL implementations. I have a proven track record in developing scalable frontend and backend solutions and experience working in agile environments with cross-functional collaboration across multiple countries. My strong problem-solving skills have been demonstrated through optimizing database structures and implementing efficient server-side integrations. I'm committed to writing clean, maintainable code that balances technical excellence with business requirements. Currently open to new opportunities within Norway, the EU, and the UK.

expertise.heading: My Expertise
expertise.description: With over 5 years of experience in full-stack development, I excel in building enterprise-level applications that prioritize user experience and performance. My technical expertise spans both frontend and backend development, with a focus on creating scalable, maintainable solutions using modern frameworks and tools. I'm particularly skilled in Next.js implementations, GraphQL, and microservice architectures. I understand the importance of balancing technical excellence with business requirements, and I'm committed to delivering solutions that meet both user needs and organizational goals. Whether it's optimizing database structures, implementing efficient server-side integrations, or creating responsive user interfaces, I approach each project with a pragmatic mindset and a focus on delivering value.

tech.heading: Tech Stack
tech.description: I work with a wide range of technologies across the full development stack.

projects.heading: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each represents a unique challenge and learning experience.

projectOne.title: Portfolio Website
projectOne.description: A responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, featuring GSAP animations and multi-language support.

projectTwo.title: E-commerce Platform
projectTwo.description: A full-featured online store with user authentication, product management, and payment processing.

projectThree.title: Mobile App
projectThree.description: A cross-platform mobile application built with React Native for both iOS and Android devices.

company1.name: Ducky
company1.shortDescription: Developing enterprise-level sustainability solutions for leading Norwegian firms
company1.description: At Ducky, I work on developing enterprise-level sustainability solutions for leading Norwegian firms, focusing on both backend microservices and frontend applications.

responsibilities.title: Key Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: Designed and implemented Python/Flask-based microservice architecture for natural language processing on Google Cloud, developed RESTful backend API services, implemented comprehensive test coverage, and optimized PostgreSQL database structures.

achievements.title: Major Achievements
achievements.content: Improved system integration and data flow across platforms, created cleaner and more efficient query performance, and delivered high-performance Single Page Applications leveraging server-side rendering.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.content: TypeScript, Python, Flask, Node.js, Docker, PostgreSQL, LLM fine-tuning, React, Next.js, GraphQL, Apollo, Firebase, Prisma ORM, Auth0, HubSpot CMS

company2.name: Oslo Nye Fagskole AS
company2.shortDescription: Developed and delivered Front End & Web Essentials curriculum
company2.description: As a part-time Subject Teacher at Oslo Nye Fagskole AS, I developed and delivered comprehensive Front End & Web Essentials curriculum for vocational students.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.content: Achieved 95% positive feedback from students on course content and teaching methodology.

company3.name: Digital Freelancer
company3.shortDescription: Designed, developed, and delivered websites for diverse clients
company3.description: As a Digital Freelancer, I successfully designed, developed, and delivered websites for over 15 clients across diverse industries.

highlights.title: Highlights
highlights.content: Created engaging educational content and interactive web-based games using HTML, CSS, JS, and WordPress. Maintained long-term client relationships with high satisfaction rates.

contact.availability: I am currently available for new opportunities within Norway, the EU, and the UK.
